title: Minimalist Backpack
description: A clean, functional backpack for everyday use. Durable canvas material with leather accents.

title: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with premium sound quality and 30-hour battery life.

title: Smart Watch Series 5
description: Stay connected and active with the latest smartwatch technology. Health tracking and notifications.

title: Leather Wallet
description: Handcrafted leather wallet with slim profile. Holds 6 cards and cash.

title: Pottery Vase
description: Modern ceramic vase suitable for dry or fresh flowers. Matte finish.
